attributes.action: Her majesty to be giving special privileges
attributes.additional_details: It’s only right & in the public best interest that her majesty the queen is giving special privileges to receive this after all she does help to run are country & the rest of the royals must also be protected
attributes.background: Allow royals including her majesty to be giving special privileges to be allowed vaccine for covid 19 it’s only right she is are queen.Boris stated on sky news that they’d be no special privileges for the royals & I & many others disagree

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Prioritise elected representatives and the royal family for Covid-19 vaccine
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560861
